title: Whatsapp freezes during whatsapp video call on Google Pixel 3XL
content:
Whatsapp application freezes or won't respond properly during whatsapp video call.
I'm able to use other apps other than whatsapp when I'm on video call.
Whatsapp functions properly when not in video call but during video call the application doesn't want to respond, can't interact with the application.
I've tried clearing the cache, data, uninstalled and reinstalled and even did a factory reset but nothing seems to work.
I don't know what the problem is.
Is this a whatsapp defect or Android 10?
I think it's not whatsapp because other manufacturers are not facing this issue.
In my opinion its a software issue.
Please Google, solve this.
I've been facing this issue for a long time now.
This is seriously very sad.
Hope this issue gets resolved fast.
